version_description: A routine maintenance fix to enhance performance and fix a few bugs along the way.
A routine maintenance fix to enhance performance and fix a few bugs along the way.
A routine maintenance fix to enhance performance and fix a few bugs along the way.
We've done some routine maintenance to fix some bugs and make the game run even smoother. Enjoy!
We've done some routine maintenance to fix some bugs and make the game run even smoother. Enjoy!
We've done some routine maintenance to fix some bugs and make the game run even smoother. Enjoy!

Hey Heroes,

This is our biggest update yet!

13 New Minions -

Try your hand at an array of new Minions from Common to Legendaries!

2 New Arenas -

Enter the Citadel of Knowledge and the Autumn Woods and enjoy your battles in brand new beautiful environments.

Updated Matchmaking -

We’ve improved matchmaking to ensure more fair battles.

Multi Deck Functionality -

Now you can save up to 5 of your favorite decks! Switch between them effortlessly.

See you in battle!

Heroic is now available WORLDWIDE with 5 Heroes, 8 breathtaking Arenas, 25 unique Spells, and 50 Minions all waiting for you to bring it on! Pick your Hero and step into battle today!
Heroic is now available WORLDWIDE with 5 Heroes, 8 breathtaking Arenas, 25 unique Spells, and 50 Minions all waiting for you to bring it on! Pick your Hero and step into battle today!
Heroic is now available WORLDWIDE with 5 Heroes, 8 breathtaking Arenas, 25 unique Spells, and 50 Minions all waiting for you to bring it on! Pick your Hero and step into battle today!

Attention Heroes, the new update is here with a brand new PvE mode!

BOSS RAID
You will team up with your guildmates to face the spider queen in a GUILD RAID. Awesome rewards await! Start preparing with your guild on the best tactics to attack. Coordination is key to winning. Use the Solo raid as a place to hone your skills.

HEROES, SPELLS AND MINIONS BALANCING
We’ve improved balancing to ensure more fun and dynamic battles.

BUG FIXES
Fixed some minor bugs.

Hey Heroes,
We’re always trying to provide you the best playing experience possible. That’s why this update is focused fully on fixing bugs and doing routine maintenance to ensure smooth battles and gameplay.
See you in battle!
The Heroic Team

Big update alert, Heroes!

New Arena Has Appeared!

Visit the all-new Shrine of the Serpent at Arena 8! Take the battle to this captivating environment and dominate your opponents!

5 New Minions Enter The Fight!

Take control of five all-new Minions, ranging from Common to Legendary! Will they make it into your favorite battle deck? Time to face off with these newcomers to the battlefield!

We've also included bug fixes and optimizations.

With this release, we’re bringing an all-new event: Last Hero Standing! Sweat it out against 7 other Heroes in action-packed rounds to see who can outlast the competition. Even better - there’s a powerful Mythic Minion waiting as an event-exclusive reward! Can you show your dominance when the stakes are high? The pressure is on!

We’ve also fixed pesky bugs that were reported by our Heroes. Thanks for the feedback!

Brand new game modes are entering the Heroic Universe! This latest update includes support for 3 completely fresh event types, each packed with fun and destruction! More info will be revealed soon!
Brand new game modes are entering the Heroic Universe! This latest update includes support for 3 completely fresh event types, each packed with fun and destruction! More info will be revealed soon!
Brand new game modes are entering the Heroic Universe! This latest update includes support for 3 completely fresh event types, each packed with fun and destruction! More info will be revealed soon!

Greetings, Heroes! This latest update brings exciting changes to the Arena!
-Quests have arrived in the Heroic Universe! Complete challenges to unlock resources and rewards to help you on your journey!
-Some new Mythic forces are lurking...Where will they appear? Look out soon for some exciting Minion news!
We’ve also been bug smashing, so fixes and optimizations are included as well.

Earn rewards for each day you log in to dominate the Arena, Heroes!

With this update, we’re adding support for Daily Login Rewards, which scale with each consecutive day you enter Heroic! Log in 7 days in a row to earn the top rewards! Be sure to play each day to grab the loot!

We’re also adding popup notifications to let you know about all of the important news and updates in the Heroic Universe.

Time to get back to battling! See you in the Arena!

A new update has hit the Arena, Heroes! Gather your army of Minions and read on!
This latest version of Heroic brings a Spell rebalance. Head to our community channels to read more about the changes!
The release also includes improvements for challenges and support for some exciting new additions coming soon. Do you know the words to Hammer Time, maybe?

The biggest update ever has arrived! From new modes to new collectibles, we've greatly expanded the Heroic Universe!

-Campaign Mode: Learn about the backstory!
-New Seasonality: Tower of Ascension Season last 4 weeks, and introduces Minion Ascensions every month to give you new ways to dominate!
-Gear Up: Personalize your playstyle with Equipment & Artifacts!
-More Social: Expanded Chat feature, option to add in-game friends, and more.

Let's get to battling!
